website_summaries.verdict: This efficient duo-leash is a great choice for buyers with dogs of various sizes and weights.
pros: Heavy-duty webbing makes for supreme leash durability
Adjustable leashes work great for dogs of all sizes
cons: Plastic adjusting device tends to break after some use

customer_reviews.title: This is the best $14 I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this, and used it today for the first time. This is the best $14 I ever spent. It makes walking the dogs so easy. I am using this with a very large dog (~100 lbs.) and very small dog (~9 pounds). Even with the massive size difference, it works very well. I love that it is adjustable so my small dog can still be in front, which is important to him (little dog syndrome!) Would recommend to anyone looking to make their life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline B

customer_reviews.title: Strong, very good and well-designed product.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product at first. But after just a month, the clip started deteriorating. With some attention, I kept using it but, after a few more weeks, the synthetic material just gave up, suddenly unleashing one of my dogs. It could have been so dangerous, I don't even want to think about it....!!
customer_reviews.author: blue

customer_reviews.title: versatile and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: great versatile product. got it to help with walking a new 3rd dog, have ended up using it for other training purposes as well such as limiting wandering for new pup who was a street dog adopted from shelter. I attach her to one of my reliable dogs and let them explore the outer gardens together with me without fear the new one will decide to explore out of bounds. it's working great!! well made, heavy duty, no tangling problems, highly recommend. nice big easy to use clips to attach to collars, and nice big center ring. dogs range in size from wolfhound to basset hound and no problem adjusting length of either or both sides to accommodate.
customer_reviews.author: alison

customer_reviews.title: Harness fastener
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a leash with double hooks and this was the closest I could find. One of my dogs can pull out of her harness occasionally and wanted to secure the harness to her collar. This way harness, dog and leash cannot become separated. I was able to take one side of this double leash and using the buckle adjustment fasten that to the harness and the clasp is then free to hook onto the collar. So, as my use of the product wasn't what it was designed for, I can review based on the quality. The material is of very high quality and would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Knaus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, even for dogs are very different sizes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, even for dogs are very different sizes. We have a Bernese mountain dog mix, and a chihuahua mix, and I use this leash to walk both of them at the same time. It resists tangles, and the built-in swivels prevent the dogs from getting caught up in each other. The build quality is also very good, I've had it for many months, and I've seen no degradation in the quality. I even like that you can use your own lease, and connect this to that.
customer_reviews.author: JTL

customer_reviews.title: Not for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this because it was too big and bulky for my small dogs. I ended up buying a smaller one at petsmart (because I was already there and saw it). So if you have small dogs, and a small leach, this is not the item for you. Would be perfect for med/large dogs, though. It arrived fast and no damage to it whatsoever. Seemed sturdy and nice. The product itself is really good. So if this works for you, I recommend it. I am basically leaving this review so people are aware it's not for small dogs. If it says it already somewhere, I didn't see it lol. That could be just me though.
customer_reviews.author: Scott.And.KikiTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cool concept but doesn’t work if you have 2 different sized dogs
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I get the concept, hence why I made the purchase. But if you have one big dog and one small dog, this does NOT work. I have a lab/border collie who is about 80ish pounds, and a full bread mutt who is 17 lbs. I put them both on it and BOOM my big dog was literally dragging and throwing my small dog around just by moving. While it was chaotic and mildly entertaining to watch, it obviously doesn’t work. And yes, I adjusted the length correctly for each. The concept is cool but I wish I could actually use it. Looks like I’m sticking to no leashes and training collars. Returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: The Rambling Raccoon

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: I have two big dogs, 60 pounds each, and when I walk them they seem to like going in opposite directions and I look crazy trying to walk them. Found this product, and compared amongst others and this one seemed to be reasonably priced and durable. I purchased it and has made my dog walking easier. I hold on to one leash and the bottom part is adjustable so it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for use on 1 dog (collar & harness)
customer_reviews.text: I had planned to use this on 1 dog to attach the leash to both dog collar and front harness. It did not work for that purpose. Even the small was too long and when shortened all of the way, there was so much overhanging and no band to tuck it in so I can't use it. It also does not seem strong--the ring seems like it would break and the straps can be cut with a scissor so do not seem very strong. The cost to ship back is almost as much as the item so won't be returning.
customer_reviews.author: LMH

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Friday, Ripped by Monday
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered to me on Friday, August 3rd. I used it on Sunday, August 5th and it really did make walking my two dogs much easier, however after just one use we noticed that it had begun to tear and will no longer work. Neither of my dogs chew on leashes, so I'm left to assume the material used is just not very good, and that it's so poorly made that with very minor pulling (we use gentle leads as well so our dogs are unable to pull much) the leash is now unusable.
customer_reviews.author: audrey cech

customer_reviews.title: Alternative use for Caldwell's no tangle dog leash
customer_reviews.text: We did not buy this as a way to more easily walk two dogs, but as a fail-safe attachment for using a harness. We have a very active dog who has been able to pull out of most harnesses, so we use this double leash to attach the regular leash to the harness and also her collar. This gives an extra layer of protection if, by chance, she does get excited and manage to pull out of the harness, she will still have the leash attachment to her collar. So far it works perfectly, though I wish I could make the double leashes even shorter.
customer_reviews.author: D S.

customer_reviews.title: They look like sled dogs and I want to yell
customer_reviews.text: I this it's hilarious seeing my two small dogs pull each other along with this coupler. They look like sled dogs and I want to yell, "mush!" There is one problem with using this system, however, when one dog potties and the other keeps moving it creates a problem. I usually have to wait for them both finish their "business" before I attach them to the coupler, otherwise things get messy. It's true that the coupler doesn't get tangled, but my crazy pups still manage to get crazy with it when dashing around. I recommend this product for owners with dogs of similar energy levels and size.
customer_reviews.author: MVogellium

customer_reviews.title: A must have training pups!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think much of it when my wife informed me she found a solution to her problem of walking our two new pups at the same time, but damn, this thing works! It is really sturdy and simplifies the two leash crossover entanglement. I'm used to using a retractable leash with our 12 year old dog but for training new pups that are getting used to a collar mevrrmind just going for a walk, this leash is a MUST have. Don't think twice, it's worth every penny. I strongly recommend it, you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Chowda

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very strong.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what took me so long to buy one of these!!!! Our first outing with the coupler was fairly comical, but my dogs (and I) got the hang of it pretty quickly. I had looked at other couplers and this one just seemed to be well made and looked stronger than the others. I am so glad I made this choice! My dogs are only 30 lbs. each and they definitely put it to the test, I think they may have broke a lesser coupler before they got the hang of it! This one held up very well and is very strong. Now off to many adventures all together!!
customer_reviews.author: happymama

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product and worked well for my pups early on
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product and worked well for my pups early on. The one downside, pups are pus and love to chew things. They chewed through the first one I purchased and then the second one. This is the only reason why I did not give this product a five star rating. Since then I've adapted their no tangled dog leash to include chain-link that replaces the nylon webbing. My dogs chewing habits are not this companies fault. The O-ring and metal clasps continue to work well with chain-link. I highly recommend this product as long as you don't have a chewer.
customer_reviews.author: Stubbs

customer_reviews.title: A Manageable Brace of Big Dogs!
customer_reviews.text: This leash coupler works great, no tangles as my two big GSD mix Rescue puppies dance and learn to walk nicely on leash together. It has been a challenge to find one sturdy enough to manage a 15-month old and a 6-month old, 65 to 70 lbs EACH. Their puppy enthusiasm can be raucous, so it was a joy to find a product that helped me wrangle them on their first training walks together. And it will be equally helpful when they are 65 lb and 95 lb adults...a big doggie brace of hounds. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Makes walkies so much easier!!
customer_reviews.text: Total game-changer. We have two yorkies about the same size (one 8lbs, one 10lbs). This has made walkies WAY easier. It's funny because the well-behaved one keeps the mischievous one in check and acts as kind of an anchor. They also duel in the streets against each other less (imagine Looney Toons fights btwn characters). Now they trot side-by-side like well-behaved reindeer. It's awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the dogs in line and easy!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with this product! I have 2 dogs weighing in at 70 lbs and 60 lbs. They are good boys but it's near impossible to walk them both together with 2 leashes going all over the place. This was the perfect solution. I was shocked how well they walked side by side. The only negative thing is my boys PULL, and I was exhausted after our walk. But that's not the leashes fault, that's my dogs! I might consider buying harness vs using their collars and maybe they won't pull so hard. Over all, great product, and I did not feel uncomfortable at all. (other people have complained about snapping)
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I got two dogs. I thought it would be a waste of money and thought it would allow one dog to pull the other one. It doesn’t! It’s the best money I ever spent on them! If one dog stops or pulls it doesn’t affect the other dog because the ring in the middle is attached to the leash. I do keep one longer than the other, this is for my alpha dog who needs to lead the way. If you have two dogs I highly recommend getting this, it makes walks so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Honesty is the best policy!!!

customer_reviews.title: My brace of German Shepherds look really cool walking side by side on this.
customer_reviews.text: This item works pretty slick. My dogs don't pull on the leads but when I get sloppy, two separate dog leashes do manage to get tangled around, over and under dogs. This eliminates one leash and therefore cuts the tangle factor down by 50%. If your dogs pull, I estimate the wear and tear on your arm will be cut by 33% because the jerking and tugging will be divided equally among the three parties at each of the three ends. Seems like a win, win any way you look at it. The adjustment slider thingys do slip so don't come to rely on them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Walk my two goldens with no problem!
customer_reviews.text: I have two golden retrievers who are pretty much attached at the hip and this no tangle leash has worked wonders for their walks. I pair it with their gentle leader harnesses and it's really made a difference. They are both very strong pullers on walks and this miraculously made them slow their pace, I think because one would always try to keep up with the other and now that they are walking at the same pace they seem to slow down and enjoy their time walking a little bit more. Game changer for me!
customer_reviews.author: Caitybelle

customer_reviews.title: 2 small dogs -- Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, we have two small dogs each about 15 pounds. One is a little more rowdy than the other but this helps keep them pretty tame on their walks. The only reason I deducted a star was if you have a light leash that doesn't have a lot of thickness to it, the medal clips tend to weigh it down low to the ground. We fixed the problem by buying a different leash and this did help but other than that it's really great especially for the price, I would buy this again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Chantyl7Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Best Double Dog Leash Option I've owned (I've tried a lot).
customer_reviews.text: This is simply the best double-dog least I've used. I have two 100 pound Tamaskans. I've used the other full leash options, that have the large foam handles that claim to be tangle free..those were a joke. This is so easy to use. I was skeptical because this was simply an attachment. But I tell you what! I went on a walk, and even some sprinting with my pups at the baseball field with this and I love it! Also you can use your own leash and just clips on which is nice and it actually works. Absolutely love it. It's great quality. Would only buy this one again in a future if I lost or broke it.
customer_reviews.author: Doyle

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR SMALL BREED
customer_reviews.text: It needs to be specified that this IS NOT for smaller dogs. I have two yorkies. One is 7 pounds and one is 14 pounds, this won't work. This is entirely too large. However will give it to my daughter, she has two pits that it will work well on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for large and medium dog walking!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the eventual addition of a 2nd dog to avoid the tangling issue of walking 2 dogs on separate leashes. We have a 10 month old 50 lb golden retriever puppy (large) and a 30 lb golden retriever/sheltie 2 yr old (medium) that we use this for. We extended the length to max capacity so it works well walking them. We obviously learned to not walk them with collars but rather harnesses since they both tug each other at times so collars alone aren’t conducive. We have ordered a harness for our sheltie mix to make the walking experience better for her. Outside of that, this works great!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Not for dogs of different sizes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping that I could walk our border collie mix and chihuahua mix, sadly the leads are quite short and not long enough to give the dogs room, pulling the dogs too close together so it does not work for us at all. The worst part is In trying to return it I found out that no returns are allowed. I will just have to cut it up, using the existing hardware to remake it so it will work for my purposes, I probably should have done that in the first place and saved the money spent on one that doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Coupler!
customer_reviews.text: This works really well, even when my dogs switch places. Another good thing is that when I want to separate the dogs (i.e. it's time to sniff the grass and poop!), I can quickly unlatch the coupler hook and attach the leash to dog 1, then use the coupler as a second leash for dog 2 until the deed is done (just hold the second hook in your hand like a leash loop and the coupler straightens out perfectly). It sounds complicated, but it really isn't (it takes about five seconds), and this little trick makes this a super versatile tool.
customer_reviews.author: J. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great for similar sized dogs
customer_reviews.text: This made walking two dogs of similar sizes great!! We tried this with our German Shepherd and a Yorkie - it didn’t work that well at all because the Yorkie would wrap the leash our our bigger dogs legs. Walking two dogs of similar size though makes it worth the cost. So much easier walking two dogs this way then separate.
customer_reviews.author: 1CrazyLife4Me

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit For Me And My Job!
customer_reviews.text: As a dog-walker, I work with many dogs and sometimes that means walking more than one at a time and this was practically a life saver. It's so much better than walking around with two or more leashes that constantly get tangled and mixed up. It's easy to control the dogs with this and it can be shortened or made longer depending on the dog size. I don't know how well this would hold up against bigger and stronger dogs but I'll update this every few months to update how it's holding up, I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Makes walking two dogs together a pleasure
customer_reviews.text: A good sturdy leash. It's a joy to walk my two small dogs on this leash. We used to have 'doggie maypole' every walk, but now it's so much easier and less tangled. Just occasionally one dog will get the leash between her legs and have to be untangled, but generally the two of them trot along very nicely. I have a lightweight single leash attached to the coupler and I was a little concerned that I may need a heavier one with both dogs pulling on the one leash. However, I find they take it in turns to walk in front so there's only ever one dog actually pulling. They love to walk along side by side too.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel LY

customer_reviews.title: Walk 2 dogs at once
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my 2nd purchase. The first one worked really well, allowing me to walk both of my 45-50 dogs at once. While I was on vacation, Jack “the ripper” pulled my wall hooks off of the wall and chewed up the no tangle leash. My dog sitter was forced to walk the dogs individually. I placed another order and it was delivered promptly, as was the first. I highly recommend this leash. The dogs don’t get tangled and it makes my life much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Triathlete

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1st use and company won't allow returns
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this garbage. It broke after 1 use. I had it 3 weeks but the company does not allow for returns. Garbage product from a bad company. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmine Waters

customer_reviews.title: Not for large breed dogs
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a while but then they broke. I was happy with them while they lasted, but that wasn't as long as it should have been. I would not recommend using this for dogs 50 lbs or more.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Lively

customer_reviews.title: A must have for two-dog owners
customer_reviews.text: This Coupler has made my life a bit easier! I have two medium-large dogs, 50lbs and 55lbs, and this coupler has enabled us to walk more cohesively as a pack than attempting to use two separate leashes (or tieing the leashes together at the midpoint). I like that the large circular joint prevents the leashes from tangling, and the dogs have more freedom to move around... I get compliments on it all the time at the dog park. It's very sturdy and of good quality. Edit: some time after the review, one of the leads separated from the ring... good thing it happened while I was leashing them and not while I was out dog walking...
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Product
customer_reviews.text: This leash simply snapped in two. This is only after my 2nd use. My dogs did not chew this leash. It is hung up high in the garage where they could not access it even if they tried. They are older dogs and know and love their leashes. They know it is for walking and not chewing. So if you (the manufacturer) are believing this is what happened...it isn't. Sorry I wasted my money!
customer_reviews.author: ChloeAnn

customer_reviews.title: I tried, but didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: The product is good quality, so there isn't anything wrong with it. The only reason I'm giving it 2 stars is because my dogs still got tangled up and we only made it about 1/2 block before switching back to regular leashes. I had high hopes it would cut down on a leash since I have 4 dogs I walk together. It would probably work well if you keep moving on the walks. My dogs stop and sniff a lot, which is why they are constantly getting tangled.
customer_reviews.author: Icky

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable, well made, takes back control
customer_reviews.text: Lightning fast delivery, well made construction, superb price. Exactly what I needed to take control of a 60# and 95# dogs with strong type A personalities. Adjustable so you can bind them close together for team work ... OR... further apart if they value personal space instead. Say goodbye to multiple leashes that wrap and twist and bind and trip you. I'm in control now when going for walks. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made and would work well for 2 dogs who walk at the same pace. I have 2 dogs, one is 28 lb and one is 35 lb. The smaller dog is a bull and does not stop when she walks. She just barrels full steam ahead. The other dog likes to stroll along and stop and sniff. This did not work for us as the dogs have different waking styles and the "bull" ended up choking the other dog because she was dragging the other dog along. It is a good concept, just not for us.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Youngs

customer_reviews.title: this would be a much better product. The dog that broke his strap is ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked for about 2 weeks. The problem is the the slider that allows you to adjust the length of the leash is made of plastic. It can't handle much stress, and when it breaks your dog will be loose. If the straps were anchored to the ring by being stitched onto themselves, this would be a much better product. The dog that broke his strap is only a 40 lbs pit bull.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 pups that I walk with. The one is almost 70 pounds while the other is 40 (still growing) and they love to pull and switch around when we walk. this helps with the no tangling. I like that you can adjust either side for shorter dogs. Definitely recommend this. you're able to control them easily with this leash.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect, no tangle double dog leash
customer_reviews.text: Being pulled in two different directions? Struggling to hold anything other than your dogs? Well struggle no more! This is the perfect, no tangle double dog leash, allowing you to walk both your dogs with one leash! Two for the price of one! My dogs switch places all the time and have yet to be tangled. (Though I do wish there was more length between the two, as my dogs pull on each other and then occasionally end up getting in each other's space when the other is doing their business).
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Useless after a 20 minute walk. Avoid with big high energy dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I have two German Shepards and was looking forward to using this for the first time. I adjusted the length to my liking before heading out on a walk. After twenty minutes of walk, I notice my female healing all by herself untethered across the street as we were crossing. The nylon adjustment had come out of the clip and separated. Clip gone somewhere on the walk. This might work for low energy dogs, but not for two high energy Shepard's who have to be corrected on walks. Now it's useless after having used it only 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy for smaller dogs but 15# and up should be ok. I use it with my two. One is blind and keeping them that close means the disabled one can go for walks. She takes signals from her sighted sibling and it’s given her more confidence to go on walks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but not the best thing out there
customer_reviews.text: This does what it needs to, the quality is great. I don't doubt the strength, but even fully extended it hardly gives my bigger dogs enough room to move around with ought pulling the other one. I bought Caldwell's dual leash soon after I bough this and it is amazing. Let's both dogs explore with 4ish feet of each other and the swivel works wonderfully. I would use this splitter only if my dual leash breaks, but I doubt it will for another few years.
customer_reviews.author: Slick B

customer_reviews.title: They didn’t like it but I think it’s a great idea
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely difficult to get it on unruly dogs. My girls get so excited when they see the leash. And they’re not used to being on the same leash. They both wanted to split up and didn’t know what to think about it it was quite comical to watch
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Thai

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap but holds strong
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 huskies. One is 50lbs and the other is 70lbs. They are not well trained and sort of do their own thing. We are all getting better at walking as a group. This product has held strong for many cats and other critters that come across our walk. I was hesitant at first but after the dogs tried pulling in different directions and this held without issue, I was all set to continue use.
customer_reviews.author: kaldrok

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Everything I wanted and needed.
customer_reviews.text: I have two 70lb dogs. Before, I wasn't able to walk them on 2 leashes together without someone helping me, so I had to walk them separately. After I got the coupler, I am able to walk them together by myself and I have good control over them. The product is strong and seems durable. Perfect for walking two dogs together. If you're wondering if you should get this, it's a definite YES. You won't be disappointed, what you see is what you get. Reasonable price, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: bluepits73

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love taking my dogs with me places, but they haven't made it easy. When I would get out of the car and get them out, one would run one way and the other would go the other way and neither would listen. Having my hands full I would get frustrated and juggling two different leashes wasn't ideal. This double leash has made the world of a difference! I do suggest using a standard leash instead of a retractable, that way you have more control and it doesn't get tangled. I'm able to hook them on in the car and I have my other hand free for other items.
customer_reviews.author: Kelc

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Both the nylon and the hardware used ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Both the nylon and the hardware used are very solid and strong. Got this for my two one-year old boxers who are about 80 lbs each and still full of energy. The longer length and the ability to adjust each "side" of the leash allows the coupler to work well with their martingale collars and their harnesses too. The nylon itself is thick and heavy duty. I've sometimes seen other types of "shiney" nylon that slips with the adjustment hardware - this one doesn't slip, it stays put under the adjustment hardware as it should. A great buy, the best coupler I've seen!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S

customer_reviews.title: Happy trails
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to walk my two dogs because I have a disability and handling two leashes made it impossible. I have a long runner in the back yard for them. I saw this when I was looking for two new runner lines. On a good weather day I try to get them out for a short walk with my granddaughter along.
customer_reviews.author: Mvb

customer_reviews.title: Great for Active, Strong Breeds
customer_reviews.text: I have a miniature pit-bull, but she is still very strong. I actually use this item to hold her harness and collar since I use an easy walk harness which can sometimes slip off the dog. It works perfectly in holding both! It's durable and holds up to my dog's strength. The only concern is the weight of the item. It's a little heavier than I expected, but I think that's what makes it so durable, especially for an active, strong dog.
customer_reviews.author: K.M.F.

customer_reviews.title: This product is not safe!! My dog saw ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is not safe!! My dog saw a deer, made one quick and unexpected lunge and it broke!! My dog ran into the woods to chase the deer. I was thinking I may not ever see my dog again. The strap pulled out of the plastic piece.
customer_reviews.author: Ann R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: they didn't like it so they would just stand there
customer_reviews.text: I got this product when my two puppies were about 10 weeks old. I tried using it then but they were too little and it was too heavy...they didn't like it so they would just stand there. They are now 7 months old and I use it when I am taking them out for a walk or run. They have figured out how to walk together. I am no longer getting pulled in different directions. I don't use it when they have to relieve themselves because they don't like being so close together while looking for their spot!
customer_reviews.author: l324

customer_reviews.title: Decent for Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to use for my GSP and a Pit/Akita mix, I definitely don't trust it with both dogs on it. If one pulls really hard then the adjustable portion comes undone. It will work well for well-trained dogs that do not pull or have any interest in hunting animals (like our GSP).
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Not just for 2 dogs
customer_reviews.text: Seems to solve the problem of our escape artist who can wiggle out of her harness. We attach one end to harness and the other end to regular collar. Gives us extra security and hopefully she won't escape again. We've tightened her harness too, but this gives me peace of mind that if she manages to get out of harness again we have the backup attachment to collar.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The buckles are cheap plastic so I can see these breaking with my pulling dog. The nylon doesn't seem all that strong either, not like the nylon dog products I've purchased. I think my dog can bite right through it. The length was misleading too...it sounded like I could shorten it much more than I actually could. If you have pulling dogs, I couldn't recommend. It won't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Bpw0614

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I buy this earlier? I absolutely love this thing. We have two dogs (1 year old 50 lb pointer and a 6 year old 55 lb hounddog). They pull like mad on this thing and it's never given a problem. It's tough and strong. They somehow still manage to get tangled up every now and then (not a manufacturing defect, but a dog defect LOL), but they stay together and love being next to each other on walks- nobody is in front of the other causing one to play catch up. And I love having one hand free when I walk them. Brilliant product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: This is so easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This works great. It doesn't tangle. It only took my dogs a couple of days to get used to how it worked and it is much easier for me than 2 leashes. I love it. I have a 60 lb. labradoodle and a 20 lb. goldendoodle. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jill R. Harwood

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this no tangle, double walker! It serves it purpose and doesn't tangle at all. Plenty of room for one dog to go potty while the other waits, or goes potty at the same time. I use this on my bassett hound mix paired up with my chihuahua. My only comment is that the adjustable straps are not secured, as well as I would like, to the opposite side of the strap. My chihuahua is blind and the loose part of the adjustable strap scares her, but I solved this by adding some velcro straps to secure it. Overall very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Miss. Atx

customer_reviews.title: Double leash
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. I have now used it several times with our puppies and it works well. I hook it to their harness and found out quickly that if the dogs are getting tangled then the double leash is too long and needs to be shortened. The double leash is adjustable and can be adjusted short or long as needed. It will grow with your dogs size and needs.
customer_reviews.author: Doug N.

customer_reviews.title: Husky and golden retriever
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to walk our puppies. We have a seven month old golden retriever and an eight month old husky and walking them on a two leash by myself was next to impossible. I bought this so i can walk the dogs at the same time with being tangled and to lessen the competitiveness of the two and so far so good. I have not had any problem with it since i have used it. Walking two strong puppies is now manageable.
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: No more tangled leashes!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. We’ve had it about a month, we use it for our 58# basset/lab mix and our 45# staffy/bulldog mix. The length is good enough where they can stop, do their business and not be disrupted by the other. (You can also adjust the length of each) Only problem for me, is the strength of these two pups combined is deadly for my hand. Hahaha. Will update review after a few more months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Maria T

customer_reviews.title: Broke during the first two miles!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it 0 stars I would. The piece to adjust the length is PLASTIC and very cheap. I took my dogs for a walk and was two miles from home when it snapped apart! It created a dangerous situation on the side of a road. I wouldn't recommend this product to anyone who wants a reliable splitter!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Tough. Just right
customer_reviews.text: Coupler Keeping A tough leash tied around the passenger seat headrest posts, with a tough coupler clipped onto it & my 2 small dogs. They can lay down, etc, but not get into my space & it keeps them safe. Much easier than putting their car harnesses on (which I can’t even find anymore. The old coupler had been weakened by being chewed.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Started great ended in a big fail.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly when I first used it. It made walking both dogs a breeze but the plastic buckle on one side completely snapped in half on the 4th use. Unfortunately it happened after the return window to get a replacement. Now to decide spend money on another one or sew and gorilla glue the strap in a permanent length.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R.

customer_reviews.title: with sturdy metal pieces and strong fabric--so it deserves the 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: There must be an art to using these 2-dog leash couplers, one which I have not yet mastered. My hope is to attach it to two different harnesses and walk my 2 pit bull mix dogs without them tangling each other up or tangling up me in the process. So far it hasn't gone well for the 3 of us. But as far as the item itself goes--it is very solidly made, with sturdy metal pieces and strong fabric--so it deserves the 5 stars I'm giving it.
customer_reviews.author: Magicbird

customer_reviews.title: Good for regular collars but not harnesses
customer_reviews.text: Having two 80-85 pound Rhodesian Ridgebacks and walking them around town by myself was difficult. They walk on an Easy Walk harness and my male would tangle me with two leashes. Ever since purchasing this, it's been less of a struggle. Walked them with martingale collars and boy they pulled me but once the male tried to tangle me, he couldn't. Definitely a great buy when worn with a regular collar and not a harness.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Great help for walking.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 90 lb labradoodle and a pug. They are both young and like to pull on walks. The labradoodle is smart and getting trained to know not to pull and which side of me to walk. So, when I hook the two of them up together with this, the big dog basically controls the little dog, and I control them both. The dogs like to walk side by side, and it's much easier on me to only have the one leash. They get tangled, but not too often.
customer_reviews.author: Fifi Bonbon

customer_reviews.title: how to walk two dogs without frustration
customer_reviews.text: This leash splitter is the goods! It works even better than I had hoped. Of course, when one of the dogs has to, er, do his/her business, I have to stop the other one from continuing the walk. You might think that the two leashes would tangle, but they never do. I'm very pleased with the product, as well as by the service provided. I would be glad to deal with this company again. I wonder whether a printed catalogue is available.
customer_reviews.author: Upton A. Savoie

customer_reviews.title: Best 2-dog coupler I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Best 2-dog coupler I've tried! Adjustable and each clasp swivels, so little to no tangling! My dogs love it because they have their own space to potty and don't bump into each other. Just don't let the dogs get behind you, or they will catch you behind the knees with their leashes. Mine are learning not to do that.
customer_reviews.author: SED

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for my two bubs
customer_reviews.text: It took some getting used to, but works great! Enough room for both of them to walk together so there isn’t any leaning in towards one another. Long enough to give them both room but not too long for them to get tangled. Great quality. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha P

customer_reviews.title: Both of the snaffle hooks swivel easily, which allows the dogs to "orbit" one another ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought one of these earlier. I've used this once to walk my 40lb German Shepherd and 30lb Finnish Lapphund. They generate a fair amount of pull between them, but the coupler showed no signs of strain. Both of the snaffle hooks swivel easily, which allows the dogs to "orbit" one another without tangling: a HUGE plus for me. The adjustment isn't drastic (16" to 24" means your dogs are between 2.5' and 4' apart at max) but otherwise no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Applebee

customer_reviews.title: This works great for our two dogs
customer_reviews.text: This works great for our two dogs...one is 30 pounds and the other is 14 pounds. They can switch sides without getting tangled up. It makes taking them for a walk much easier than with two separate leashes.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Black

customer_reviews.title: Walking the dogs together...
customer_reviews.text: This works great as a coupler that you can change the lengths of each side. Works for my two male rescue pit bulls, the one is not worried about "leading", the other one wants to be a few steps ahead and this keeps them together by shortening the side with the "leader" and keeping the longer side for the passive walker.
customer_reviews.author: Christeen Landino

customer_reviews.title: Good Quailty Product.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. product. Just didn't work for my dogs. This size is definitely made for a large breed. I have a lab and mini aussie. Fine for the lab but to heave for the aussie. And the lab just dragged the little guy along. Waited to long to return . Wish it had a longer return policy. Only used once
customer_reviews.author: Litzy619

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple piece of equipment but it does exactly what I hoped for. Since using this I've only had 1 problem and it's not the fault of the coupler. We have two 10-month-old goldens who weigh in about 48 lbs each. When they both spot a chipmunk at the same moment there's almost a 100 lbs of energetic, muscled puppy heading off after it with me dragged behind, desperately trying to keep control! :0). As I said - not the fault of the leash.
customer_reviews.author: NHAndy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, substantial
customer_reviews.text: This product is probably a bit overkill for my two dogs, who are both under 20 lbs, but it seems to be well constructed and heavy duty.The coupler allows me to walk them using only one hand, which was what I was wanting to do. It is adjustable so that the dogs don't have to be right on top of each other. Now if they will adjust so that they are more often in unison regarding the direction they want to go, we'll be all set. I am sure this will be very useful and would recommend it to others unless they have very small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie’s neighbor

customer_reviews.title: Built like a tank!
customer_reviews.text: We have two BIG Australian Shepherds (70 pounds) It always annoyed me to walk them with two leashes ... Until I found this thing! I don't like flimsy leashes, I want something that I KNOW won't rip - I am sure I could pull two trucks with this thing. This works PERFECTLY with a bungee leash that I also bought on amazon:
customer_reviews.author: Maximo B.

customer_reviews.title: ... used one before but it ended up being the best investment for walking 2 dogs that like to pull ...
customer_reviews.text: Using this scared me initially​ because I had never used one before but it ended up being the best investment for walking 2 dogs that like to pull in opposite directions. It keeps them together and prevents twisting.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Janisch

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to walk my two medium sized dogs and it works really good. You can make it comfortable for each dog. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: awinters40

customer_reviews.title: Like the separate adjustable lengths on each one
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipment. Decent quality. Like the separate adjustable lengths on each one. Plan on using on my one dog connecting at two places on her harness because she always manages to houdini her way out of leash connections. This and carabiners ease my paranoia of losing her during walks.
customer_reviews.author: Celena

customer_reviews.title: Pup in Training
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old Shiba is an excellent walker! She stays focused and folllows the path. Our 1 year old Shiba is an explorer and likes to look at EVERYTHING along the way! Though he has learned quite a bit from his big sister, it's been an ongoing training. This purchase has been a dream come true!! Our pup is now keeping pace with big sister making for easygoing walks!
customer_reviews.author: Cici

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: The jury is still out of this as I haven't had an opportunity yet to use it a lot. It works much better than I thought it would and with its swivel the dogs don't as tangled as I thought they would. The only negative (and it is not specific to this product) is to keep in mind that two dogs pull twice as hard as one, so keep in mind so that they don't pull you off your feet. For this reason this might work better for smaller dogs rather than big ones.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerman

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed
customer_reviews.text: This works as designed. I unfortunately have hunting dogs and when trying to walk them they pull me for a walk. With that being said it helps that the dogs can't get out in front of the other. I would recommend this for any other type of dog where you have two.
customer_reviews.author: D.D.

customer_reviews.title: Walking is much easier with this!
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy, and the latches pivot easily so if you have pups who insist upon swapping places while walking there are no tangles. The adjustable length allows us to have the dogs at different lengths too, which is nice- our puppy is forced to follow the adult dog and it's really helpful in keeping him focused on the walk instead of eating everything on the ground. We have 2 cocker spaniels but it looks strong enough to handle larger breeds without issue. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: I do wish that the sections could be shortened to their fullest without so much excess strap hanging off- I like to keep my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I've had the coupler for almost a week now and it makes walking my two dogs so much easier! I have an 18lb Sheltie and a 37 lb mix and since each section can be adjusted, I was able to adjust appropriatley for their height. I do wish that the sections could be shortened to their fullest without so much excess strap hanging off- I like to keep my dogs very close to me so I shortened each section so much so that I had to bundle the excess strap with a zip-tie.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought this years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy double leash. We have 4 dogs and I use this on the larger two. Once they got the hang of walking together instead of trying to pull each other in different directions this made our walks much easier. I attach them together and walk then both with one hand. I have my free hand to carry the poopy bags. The quality is great, I'll have this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Cinci Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Teaching the unruly one to walk!
customer_reviews.text: This works well. They rarely get tangled and the young one is becoming an excellent walker with the older's example :D My only complaint is a minor one, there's a lot of strap.... which might be good if you have big dogs but for two medium sized ones it's a bit of overkill. To the good, it's extremely simple to use and very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to walk 2 50 pound dogs together. Was worried that it would be twice the pull but was told that it is not that bad as the dogs will pull on each other. That is exactly what happened and now they both pretty much just walk together quite nicely. Easy to use and adjust. Seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: MCK

customer_reviews.title: They walk pretty much right next to each other
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for our two Aussies. They walk pretty much right next to each other, and with two separate retractable leashes they would get tangled up constantly. I was a little skeptical at first but we put them on a 16 foot retractable leash with the Coupler and it was great. They're able to walk together and change sides no problem. The Coupler doesn't get caught underneath them or tangled too much. I mean yea they get a little tangled once in a while but it's night and day compared to two separate leashes. I have and would recommend this to a multiple doggo family.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Item is great for our dogs
customer_reviews.text: Item is great for our dogs. They do not get tangled and I can easily walk them into pet stores and outside. I didn't pay attention to how big this item is however because it is meant for bigger dogs. I have two very small (6 and 10 pound) malteses, but the leash still works for them and I do not feel I will have to worry about them breaking away from the hooks. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Such a handy accessory to have if you have two ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a handy accessory to have if you have two dogs, makes walking them alone so much easier. It's also adjustment so that you can walk two dogs that are completely different sizes, or, you can choose if you want to walk between them and have space, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Maegan Harless

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: Works really well but I recommend if you're using this to use a leash that has a swivel at the end because I kept having to untangle the leash. It's so much better than them pulling in different directions.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: A lighter weight product at a lower price would have been better for me personally because both my dogs weigh less ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is well worth the money for medium to large dogs! My only complaint is that I was looking to purchase something that would work for small dogs and this is far heavier and stronger than I needed. A lighter weight product at a lower price would have been better for me personally because both my dogs weigh less than 20 lbs each.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Walks made easier
customer_reviews.text: Why have I not always used this is all I can think! I have to strong labs that I take on walks but when you have one pulling one way and the other another way it makes the walk a little less enjoyable! This is a sturdy product that helps me keep them together and the option to either put them closer together or spread out a bit! Over all great product
customer_reviews.author: BestBooks

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my two pups, a 50 lb boxer mix and a 70 lb Shepherd mix. It's proven to be strong enough even when they pull and it has made the once impossible job of walking them by myself possible. I keep the extensions on the shorter side though so my girls don't get tangled.
customer_reviews.author: ChandraSJ

customer_reviews.title: Needs better plastic piece
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the plastic is not strong enough to support a big dog. Typical pulling will move the position of the plastic piece. Then when my dog lunged, it snapped like a twig. The metal and nylon are good quality though, so I found a shoe repair shop to sew the nylon around the metal ring for a permanent fix.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great connector for our two huskies!
customer_reviews.text: We use this to connect our two ~50lbs huskies together for running in crowded areas. Works great, is very sturdy and keeps them linked together. Only need one sturdy leash connected to a running belt and off we go!
customer_reviews.author: msmary33

customer_reviews.title: Frees up a hand
customer_reviews.text: Great product that allows me to walk both of my large dogs on one leash. The dogs get a little tangled here and there, but that's because they circle each other or step over each other. I like being able to have one hand free to hold my 3 year olds hand when we cross the street.
customer_reviews.author: ProudMommy1

customer_reviews.title: Can't imagine walking my girls without this!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a game changer for walking our hounds. They stay together and we don't have to wrestle around with them going in different directions. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kels

product_meta.title: Caldwell's Pet Supply Co. No Tangle Dog Leash Coupler, Double Dog Walker - Trainer Leash - Two Dogs Adjustable Splitter Lead 1 X 16-24 Inches
feature_bullets: Size Option: Our LARGE (original) Coupler is 1" wide and extends from 16" - 24" in length. Our SMALL Coupler is 1/2" wide and extends from 11" - 20" in length. (Note: both of these coupler measurements do not include the additional length of the bolt clasps and alloy connection ring.)
Superior Materials: Made of industrial grade, water-repellent and mildew resistant polyester webbing. (think seatbelt)
Built to Last: Features two extra-strength nickel plated leash clasps and a heavy duty alloy ring. Strong polyester weave doesn't stretch and has a very high break strength.
Tangle-Resistant: Designed with a strong alloy ring and nickel plated bolt cllasps makes it easy to keep dogs on leash.

Easy to Use: Adjust the two straps at appropriate lengths for each of your dogs, then clip your single dog leash to the heavy duty center alloy ring, and finally clip the end clasps your dogs' collars/harnesses. You're set to go!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
